column4: I cannot find this suggestion.                          Test different "Sound Servers": Go to System > Preferences > Multimedia Systems Selector. From there, you can test the different options. For me, there are four different sound servers installed, and only one works. This is probably your problem if you cannot play audio with xine or rhythmbox, but you can with xmms or helix/realplayer.
This was in ubuntu help debugging sound.
go to Menu and enable that particular menu
